DOC.brief_summary: This randomise control trial establish effect contraceptive intervention deliver mobile phone app instant messaging acceptability effective contraception Tajikistan . Woman men age 16-24 randomised access Tajik Family Planning Alliance 's sexual reproductive health app ( control ) app plus 0-3 instant message day 4 month ( intervention ) . Participants complete questionnaire baseline 4 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Delivered App Instant Messaging Increase Acceptability Effective Contraception Among Young People Tajikistan
DOC.criteria: Aged 1624 Own personal Android mobile phone Live Tajikistan Can read Tajik Russian
